Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.network.socket

Class SocketClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.network.socket.SocketClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, PingSender
public class SocketClient extends Object implements Client, PingSender
Class representing a client using Socket.
